sn24.4:1.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.4:1.3: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:2.1: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.4:2.2: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn24.4:2.6: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.4:2.7: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn24.4:3.4: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:3.5: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:3.12: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:3.13: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:3.15: “Yampidaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn24.4:3.17: api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.4:3.18: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn24.4:4.1: “Yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa imesu ca ṭhānesu kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti, dukkhepissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti …pe… dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāyapissa kaṅkhā pahīnā hoti—
sn24.4:4.2: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
